è·³è‡³ä¸»è¦å…§å®¹
          • 7.3.1 å‘é‡ã€çŸ©é˜µã€å¼ é‡
            • 7.3.2 ç‰›é¡¿è¿­ä»£æ³•
              • 7.3.3 é«˜æ–¯æ¶ˆå…ƒ
                • 7.3.4 æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥æ’å€¼
                  • 7.3.5 æ•°å€¼ä¼˜åŒ–SIMD
                    • 7.3.6 æ’åˆ—ç»„åˆåŸºç¡€
                      • 7.3.7 å¡ç‰¹å…°æ•°
                        • 7.3.8 ç¬¬ä¸€ç±»æ–¯ç‰¹æ—æ•°

                              • 1. JarvisMarch ç®—æ³•

                                7.3.11 æ±‚å‡¸åŒ…

                                iEDAå¤§çº¦ 10 åˆ†é’Ÿ

                                # å‡¸åŒ…

                                ç”±å‡¸åŒ…ç‚¹é›†çš„æ€§è´¨æˆ‘ä»¬å¯çŸ¥å‡¸åŒ…ç®—æ³•çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼ŒæŒ‰é¡ºåºæ„å»ºå‡¸åŒ…ç‚¹é›†ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ç»´æŠ¤å®ƒï¼Œç›´åˆ°å®Œæˆç‚¹çš„éå†ã€‚

                                å…¶ç²¾é«“åœ¨äºé¡ºåºå’Œç»´æŠ¤è¯¥æ€§è´¨ã€‚ç½‘ä¸Šçš„ç®—æ³•ä»£ç ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥å¾€å¾€æ˜¯å¯»æ‰¾è¾¹è§’ç‚¹å’Œå…¶ç›¸é‚»ç‚¹ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¾¹è§’ç‚¹å¿…ä¼šåœ¨å‡¸åŒ…ç‚¹é›†ä¸­ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯å…¶å®å¤šæ­¤ä¸€ä¸¾ï¼Œç”±äºéœ€è¦é¡ºåºï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å…ˆå°†æ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹æŒ‰åæ ‡æ’åˆ—ï¼Œæ’åˆ—å®Œçš„æœ€åˆå…ƒç´ ä¹Ÿå¿…ä¸ºè¾¹è§’ç‚¹ã€‚

                                é¦–å…ˆåœ¨å‡¸åŒ…ç‚¹é›†ä¸­åŠ å…¥æ’åºåçš„å‰ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨å‡¸åŒ…ç‚¹é›†ä¸­å–å‡ºæœ«å°¾ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œä»¥è¿™ä¸¤ç‚¹æ„æˆçš„è¾¹å¯¹æ¥ä¸‹æ¥çš„ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ã€‚æ¯æ¬¡å¤„ç†é€šè¿‡å‘é‡åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åœ¨è¾¹çš„å†…ä¾§ï¼Œè‹¥åœ¨å†…ä¾§åˆ™è·³è¿‡è¿™ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œè§†ä¸ºå·²å¤„ç†ï¼Œè‹¥åœ¨å¤–ä¾§åˆ™è¯´æ˜æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰€ç”¨çš„è¾¹å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯å‡¸åŒ…æ‰€è¦çš„è¾¹ï¼Œæ•…æŠ›å¼ƒå½“å‰å‡¸åŒ…ç‚¹é›†çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åå†å–æœ«å°¾ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œè¿­ä»£åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å°†è¯¥ç‚¹åŠ å…¥ã€‚ç”±æ­¤éå†å®Œå³äº§ç”Ÿå‡¸åŒ…ç‚¹é›†ã€‚ï¼ˆé›¾ï¼‰åº”è¯¥æ­£åºéå†å®Œå€’åºéå†ä¸€æ¬¡å›åˆ°èµ·å§‹ç‚¹ï¼Œæ‰æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå°é—­å‡¸åŒ…ï¼Œä¸ç„¶åªæœ‰ä¸€åŠ

                                å‡¸åŒ…ç±»å‹çš„é¢˜ç®—æ³•ä¸»è¦æœ‰ä¸‰ç§ï¼šJarvisMarch ç®—æ³•ã€Graham ç®—æ³•å’Œ Andrew ç®—æ³•ï¼Œè¿™ä¸‰ç§ç®—æ³•æ—¶é—´æ€§èƒ½ä¸Šé€’å¢ã€‚

                                # 1. JarvisMarch ç®—æ³•

                                # 1.1 æ€æƒ³

                                çºµåæ ‡æœ€å°ç„¶åæ¨ªåæ ‡æœ€å°çš„ç‚¹ä¸€å®šæ˜¯å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹ï¼Œ æˆ‘ä»¬å°†å…¶è®°ä¸º ï¼Œä» å¼€å§‹ï¼ŒæŒ‰é€†æ—¶é’ˆçš„æ–¹å‘ï¼Œé€ä¸ªæ‰¾å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹ï¼Œæ¯å‰è¿›ä¸€æ­¥æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å«ä½œæ­¥è¿›æ³•ã€‚

                                • é€‰å–ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
                                  å‡è®¾å·²æ‰¾åˆ° ã€ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ©ç”¨è·Ÿ å‘é‡å¤¹è§’æœ€å°çš„ç‚¹ä½œä¸º ã€‚ï¼ˆ åˆ™åˆ©ç”¨ å‘é‡å’Œæ°´å¹³çº¿çš„å¤¹è§’ï¼‰

                                # 1.2 ä»£ç 

                                /******************************************************************
                    Jarvis Marchçš„æ­¥è¿›ç®—æ³•
ç®—æ³•å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(nH)ã€‚ï¼ˆå…¶ä¸­ n æ˜¯ç‚¹çš„æ€»ä¸ªæ•°ï¼ŒH æ˜¯å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼‰
******************************************************************/

//#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <queue>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
 
using namespace std;
 
const int MAXN = 10005;
const double MAXD = 1e9;
const double ACCUR = 1e-9;
 
struct node
{
    double x, y;        //ç‚¹çš„åæ ‡
    bool operator < (const node n) const
    {
        if (abs(y-n.y) < ACCUR) return x < n.x;
        else    return y < n.y;
    }
    bool operator == (const node n) const
    {
        return (abs(x-n.x) < ACCUR) && (abs(y-n.y) < ACCUR);
    }
    void operator = (const node n)
    {
        x = n.x;
        y = n.y;
    }
};
 
struct vect
{
    double x, y;
    void operator = (const vect v)
    {
        x = v.x;
        y = v.y;
    }
    double operator *(const vect v) const
    {
        return x*v.x + y*v.y;
    }
};
 
bool equal (const double d1, const double d2)
{
    return abs(d1-d2) < ACCUR;
}
vect vform(const node n1, const node n2)
{
    vect tmpv;
    tmpv.x = n2.x - n1.x;
    tmpv.y = n2.y - n1.y;
    return tmpv;
}
double vlen(const vect v)
{
    return sqrt(v.x*v.x+v.y*v.y);
}
double vcos(const vect v1, const vect v2)
{
    return (v1*v2)/(vlen(v1)*vlen(v2));
}
double area (const node n1, const node n2, const node n3)
{
    double b1, b2, b3;
    b1 = vlen(vform(n1,n2));
    b2 = vlen(vform(n2,n3));
    b3 = vlen(vform(n3,n1));
    double b = (b1+b2+b3)/2;
    return sqrt(b*(b-b1)*(b-b2)*(b-b3));
}
 
node p[MAXN];           //ç‚¹é›†
queue <node> bq;        //å‡¸åŒ…é¡¶ç‚¹é›†
 
int main()
{
    int n;
    while(scanf("%d", &n) == 1)
    {
        if(n == 0)
        {
            break;
        }
        /*ã€æ³¨æ„ã€‘ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹å…ˆä¸æ ‡è®°ï¼Œä½œä¸ºå¾ªç¯ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆå³æœ€åæ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼‰*/
        int f[MAXN] = {0};      //ç‚¹é›†æ ‡è®°æ•°ç»„;
        vect v;                 //vè¡¨ç¤ºä¸Šä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹å½¢æˆçš„å‘é‡ã€‚
        node p0, p1;             //p0è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œp1è¡¨ç¤ºä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ã€‚
        p0.x = p0.y = MAXD;     //åˆå§‹åŒ–
 
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
        {
            scanf("%lf%lf", &(p[i].x), &(p[i].y));
            if (p[i] < p0)
            {
                p0 = p[i];
            }
        }
 
        p1 = p0;                //åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹
        //ã€æ³¨æ„ã€‘åˆå§‹åŒ–å‘é‡çš„é€‰å–è·Ÿç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹çš„é€‰å–å…³ã€‚
        //å¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹æ˜¯æ¨ªåæ ‡æœ€å°ç„¶åçºµåæ ‡æœ€å°åˆ™åˆå§‹å‘é‡ä¸ºç«–ç›´å•ä½å‘é‡
        v.x = 1; v.y = 0;       //åˆå§‹å‘é‡ä¸ºæ°´å¹³å•ä½å‘é‡ã€‚
        do
        {
            node p2;            //å¾…åˆ¤å®šçš„ç‚¹ã€‚
            vect v1;            //å¾…åˆ¤å®šçš„å‘é‡
            int j;              //å¸¦åˆ¤å®šçš„ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹æ ‡
            double minvcos = -1, minvlen = MAXD;    //åˆå§‹æœ€å¤§å¤¹è§’å’Œæœ€å°å‘é‡é•¿åº¦ã€‚
            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
            {
                if (!f[i])      //åˆ¤æ–­è¯¥ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»åœ¨å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Š
                {
                    vect tmpv;
                    tmpv.x = p[i].x-p1.x;
                    tmpv.y = p[i].y-p1.y;
                    if (vcos(v,tmpv) > minvcos)
                    {
                        p2 = p[i];
                        v1 = tmpv;
                        j = i;
                        minvcos = vcos(v,tmpv);
                        minvlen = vlen(tmpv);
                    }
                    else if (equal(vcos(v,tmpv),minvcos) && vlen(tmpv) < minvlen)
                    {
                        p2 = p[i];
                        v1 = tmpv;
                        j = i;
                        minvcos = vcos(v,tmpv);
                        minvlen = vlen(tmpv);
                    }
                }
            }
            bq.push(p2);
            p1 = p2;
            v = v1;
            f[j] = 1;
            //printf("minvcos=%f,minvlen=%f\n", minvcos, minvlen);
        }while(!(p1==p0));
 
        /*
        while(!bq.empty())
        {
            node tmpp = bq.front();
            printf("(%f,%f)\n", tmpp.x, tmpp.y);
            bq.pop();
        }
        */
        
        //å‡¸åŒ…å‘¨é•¿
        double ans = 0;
        node fp, ep;
        fp = p0;
        while(!bq.empty())
        {
            ep = bq.front();
            bq.pop();
            ans += vlen(vform(fp, ep));
            fp = ep;
        }
        printf("%.2f\n", ans);
     
        /*
        //å‡¸åŒ…é¢ç§¯
        double ans = 0;
        node fp = bq.front();
        bq.pop();
        node np = bq.front();
        bq.pop();
        while(!bq.empty())
        {
            node ep = bq.front();
            bq.pop();
            ans += area(fp,np,ep);
            np = ep;
            //printf("(%f,%f)\n", tmpp.x, tmpp.y);
        }
        printf("%d\n", (int)ans/50);
        */
    }
    return 0;
}

                                # 2. Graham ç®—æ³•

                                # 2.1 æ€æƒ³

                                æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹æ”¾åœ¨äºŒç»´åæ ‡ç³»ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™çºµåæ ‡æœ€å°çš„ç‚¹ä¸€å®šæ˜¯å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹ï¼Œè®°ä¸º ã€‚è®¡ç®—å„ä¸ªç‚¹ç›¸å¯¹ çš„å¹…è§’ï¼ŒæŒ‰ä»å°åˆ°å¤§çš„é¡ºåºå¯¹å„ä¸ªç‚¹æ’åºã€‚ï¼ˆå½“å¹…è§’ç›¸åŒæ˜¯ï¼Œè·ç¦» æ¯”è¾ƒè¿‘çš„æ’åœ¨å‰é¢ï¼‰åˆ™å¹…è§’æœ€å°çš„ç‚¹å’Œæœ€å¤§çš„ç‚¹ä¸€å®šåœ¨å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Šã€‚å–å¹…è§’æœ€å°çš„ç‚¹è®°ä¸º ï¼Œå°† ã€ å…¥æ ˆã€‚è¿æ¥æ ˆé¡¶çš„ç‚¹å’Œæ¬¡æ ˆé¡¶çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°ç›´çº¿ ï¼Œçœ‹å½“å‰ç‚¹æ˜¯åœ¨ç›´çº¿çš„å³è¾¹è¿˜æ˜¯å·¦è¾¹ï¼Œåœ¨å³è¾¹åˆ™æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ä¸æ˜¯å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†å…¶å¼¹å‡ºï¼Œè¿”å›ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œã€‚å¦‚æœåœ¨å·¦è¾¹ï¼Œåˆ™å½“å‰ç‚¹æ˜¯å‡¸åŒ…ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹ã€‚ä¸€ç›´åˆ°å¹…è§’æœ€å¤§çš„é‚£ä¸ªç‚¹ä¸ºä¹‹ã€‚

                                • å‰ç§¯åŸç†
                                  ä¸¤ä¸ªå‘é‡çš„å‰ç§¯ ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ç”¨ç»“æœçš„æ­£è´Ÿä»£è¡¨å‰ä¹˜ç»“æœçš„æ–¹å‘ã€‚è¯¥å…¬å¼æœ¬è´¨æ˜¯ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸‰ç»´å‘é‡ï¼ˆ è½´åˆ†é‡ä¸º0ï¼‰å‰ä¹˜çš„ç»“æœï¼ˆåŸæ¥ç»“æœä¸ºï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ æ˜¯ è½´å•ä½æ­£å‘é‡ï¼‰ã€‚

                                # 2.2 ä»£ç 

                                /************************************************************************
                        Graham Scanç®—æ³•
æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(nlogn)ã€‚Scanè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸ºO(n)ï¼Œé¢„å¤„ç†æ’åºä¸ºO(nlogn)ã€‚
é¢„å¤„ç†æ’åºï¼šæè§’æ’åºã€‚
************************************************************************/

//#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <stack>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
 
using namespace std;
 
const int MAXN = 10005;
const double MAXD = 1e9;
const double ACCUR = 1e-9;
 
struct node
{
    double x, y;        //ç‚¹çš„åæ ‡
    bool operator < (const node n) const
    {
        if (abs(y-n.y) < ACCUR) return x < n.x;
        else    return y < n.y;
    }
    bool operator == (const node n) const
    {
        return (abs(x-n.x) < ACCUR) && (abs(y-n.y) < ACCUR);
    }
    void operator = (const node n)
    {
        x = n.x;
        y = n.y;
    }
};
 
struct vect
{
    double x, y;
    void operator = (const vect v)
    {
        x = v.x;
        y = v.y;
    }
    //å‰ç§¯
    double operator *(const vect v) const
    {
        return x*v.y - y*v.x;
    }
};
 
node p0;            //çºµåæ ‡æœ€å°çš„ç‚¹
 
bool equal (const double d1, const double d2)
{
    return abs(d1-d2) < ACCUR;
}
vect vform(const node n1, const node n2)
{
    vect tmpv;
    tmpv.x = n2.x - n1.x;
    tmpv.y = n2.y - n1.y;
    return tmpv;
}
double vlen(const vect v)
{
    return sqrt(v.x*v.x+v.y*v.y);
}
double vcos(const vect v1, const vect v2)
{
    return (v1*v2)/(vlen(v1)*vlen(v2));
}
//æè§’æ’åº
bool cmpp (const node p1, const node p2)
{
    vect v1, v2;
    v1 = vform(p0, p1);
    v2 = vform(p0, p2);
    if (equal(v1*v2,0))
    {
        return vlen(v1) < vlen(v2);
    }
    else
    {
        return v1*v2 > 0;
    }
}
//å‰ç§¯åˆ¤æ–­ç‚¹ï¼ˆv2çš„ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼‰åœ¨v1å·¦è¾¹è¿˜æ˜¯å³è¾¹
bool cmpv (const vect v1, const vect v2)
{
    return (v1*v2 > 0) || equal(v1*v2,0);
}
double area (const node n1, const node n2, const node n3)
{
    /*
    //æµ·ä¼¦å…¬å¼
    double b1, b2, b3;
    b1 = vlen(vform(n1,n2));
    b2 = vlen(vform(n2,n3));
    b3 = vlen(vform(n3,n1));
    double b = (b1+b2+b3)/2;
    return sqrt(b*(b-b1)*(b-b2)*(b-b3));
    */
 
    //å‰ç§¯å…¬å¼ï¼ˆå‰ç§¯ä¸ºå¹³è¡Œå››è¾¹å½¢é¢ç§¯ï¼‰
    vect v1, v2;
    v1 = vform(n1, n2);
    v2 = vform(n1, n3);
    return abs(v1*v2)/2;
}
 
node p[MAXN];           //ç‚¹é›†
stack <node> bs;        //å‡¸åŒ…é¡¶ç‚¹é›†
 
int main()
{
    int n;
    p0.x = p0.y = MAXD; //åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
    {
        scanf("%lf%lf", &(p[i].x), &(p[i].y));
        if(p[i] < p0)
        {
            p0 = p[i];
        }
    }
    sort(p,p+n,cmpp);
    bs.push(p[0]);
    bs.push(p[1]);
    int j = 2;
    while(j < n)
    {
        //å–å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶å’Œæ¬¡æ ˆé¡¶
        node p1, p2;
        p2 = bs.top();
        bs.pop();
        p1 = bs.top();
        //æ„é€ å‰ä¹˜å‘é‡
        vect v1, v2;
        v1 = vform(p1,p2);
        v2 = vform(p2,p[j]);
        if(cmpv(v1,v2))
        {
            bs.push(p2);
            bs.push(p[j]);
            ++j;
        }
    }
    /*
    while(!bs.empty())
    {
        node tmpp = bs.top();
        printf("(%f,%f)\n", tmpp.x, tmpp.y);
        bs.pop();
    }
    */
    /*
    //è®¡ç®—å‘¨é•¿
    double ans = 0;
    node fp, ep;
    fp = p[0];
    while(!bs.empty())
    {
        ep = bs.top();
        bs.pop();
        ans += vlen(vform(fp, ep));
        fp = ep;
    }
    printf("%.2f\n", ans);
    */
 
    //è®¡ç®—é¢ç§¯
    double ans = 0;
    node fp, np, ep;
    fp = bs.top();
    bs.pop();
    np = bs.top();
    bs.pop();
    while(!bs.empty())
    {
        ep = bs.top();
        bs.pop();
        ans += area(fp,np,ep);
        np = ep;
    }
    printf("%d\n", (int)ans/50);
    return 0;
}

                                # 3. Andrew ç®—æ³•

                                # 3.1 æ€æƒ³

                                é¢„å¤„ç†æ’åºæ”¹ä¸ºæ°´å¹³æ’åºï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§æ¨ªåæ ‡ä»å°åˆ°å¤§è¿›è¡Œæ’åºï¼Œæ¨ªåæ ‡ç›¸åŒåˆ™æŒ‰çºµåæ ‡ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’ã€‚æŒ‰ç…§ graham ç®—æ³•æ€æƒ³ä» ã€ æ‰«ææ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹å¾—åˆ°ä¸‹å‡¸åŒ…ï¼Œå†ä» ã€ æ‰«ææ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹å¾—åˆ°ä¸Šå‡¸åŒ…ï¼ŒäºŒè€…ç»“åˆå³ä¸ºæ•´ä¸ªå‡¸åŒ…ã€‚ï¼ˆæ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™é‡Œçš„ ä¸ä¸€å®šåœ¨å‡¸åŒ…é‡Œï¼‰

                                # 3.2 ä»£ç 

                                /************************************************************************
                    Andrewç®—æ³•ï¼ˆGraham Scanç®—æ³•å˜ç§ï¼‰
æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(nlogn)ã€‚Scanè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸ºO(n)ï¼Œé¢„å¤„ç†æ’åºä¸ºO(nlogn)ã€‚
é¢„å¤„ç†æ’åºï¼šæ°´å¹³æ’åºæ’åºã€‚
************************************************************************/
 
//#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <stack>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
 
using namespace std;
 
const int MAXN = 10005;
const double MAXD = 1e9;
const double ACCUR = 1e-9;
 
struct node
{
    double x, y;        //ç‚¹çš„åæ ‡
    //æ°´å¹³æ’åºï¼ˆä¸æè§’æ’åºä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œåªèƒ½ç¡®å®šp0å’Œpn-1åœ¨å‡¸åŒ…å†…ï¼‰
    bool operator < (const node n) const
    {
        if (abs(x-n.x) < ACCUR) return y < n.y;
        else    return x < n.x;
    }
    bool operator == (const node n) const
    {
        return (abs(x-n.x) < ACCUR) && (abs(y-n.y) < ACCUR);
    }
    void operator = (const node n)
    {
        x = n.x;
        y = n.y;
    }
};
 
struct vect
{
    double x, y;
    void operator = (const vect v)
    {
        x = v.x;
        y = v.y;
    }
    //å‰ç§¯
    double operator *(const vect v) const
    {
        return x*v.y - y*v.x;
    }
};
 
bool equal (const double d1, const double d2)
{
    return abs(d1-d2) < ACCUR;
}
vect vform(const node n1, const node n2)
{
    vect tmpv;
    tmpv.x = n2.x - n1.x;
    tmpv.y = n2.y - n1.y;
    return tmpv;
}
//è®¡ç®—å‘é‡é•¿åº¦
double vlen(const vect v)
{
    return sqrt(v.x*v.x+v.y*v.y);
}
//è®¡ç®—å‘é‡å¤¹è§’ä½™å¼¦å€¼
double vcos(const vect v1, const vect v2)
{
    return (v1*v2)/(vlen(v1)*vlen(v2));
}
/*
//æè§’æ’åº
bool cmpp (const node p1, const node p2)
{
    vect v1, v2;
    v1 = vform(p0, p1);
    v2 = vform(p0, p2);
    if (equal(v1*v2,0))
    {
        return vlen(v1) < vlen(v2);
    }
    else
    {
        return v1*v2 > 0;
    }
}
*/
//å‰ç§¯åˆ¤æ–­ç‚¹ï¼ˆv2çš„ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼‰åœ¨v1å·¦è¾¹è¿˜æ˜¯å³è¾¹
bool cmpv (const vect v1, const vect v2)
{
    return (v1*v2 > 0) || equal(v1*v2,0);
}
double area (const node n1, const node n2, const node n3)
{
    /*
    //æµ·ä¼¦å…¬å¼
    double b1, b2, b3;
    b1 = vlen(vform(n1,n2));
    b2 = vlen(vform(n2,n3));
    b3 = vlen(vform(n3,n1));
    double b = (b1+b2+b3)/2;
    return sqrt(b*(b-b1)*(b-b2)*(b-b3));
    */
 
    //å‰ç§¯å…¬å¼ï¼ˆå‰ç§¯ä¸ºå¹³è¡Œå››è¾¹å½¢é¢ç§¯ï¼‰
    vect v1, v2;
    v1 = vform(n1, n2);
    v2 = vform(n1, n3);
    return abs(v1*v2)/2;
}
 
node p[MAXN];           //ç‚¹é›†
stack <node> bs;        //å‡¸åŒ…é¡¶ç‚¹é›†
 
int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
    {
        scanf("%lf%lf", &(p[i].x), &(p[i].y));
    }
    sort(p,p+n);
    //æ­£å‘æ‰«æï¼ˆä¸Šå‡¸åŒ…ï¼‰
    bs.push(p[0]);
    bs.push(p[1]);
    int j = 2;
    while(j < n)
    {
        //å–å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶å’Œæ¬¡æ ˆé¡¶
        node p1, p2;
        p2 = bs.top();
        bs.pop();
        //p1ä¸ä¸€å®šåœ¨å‡¸åŒ…ä¸­
        if(bs.empty())
        {
            bs.push(p2);
            bs.push(p[j]);
            ++j;
        }
        else
        {
            p1 = bs.top();
            //æ„é€ å‰ä¹˜å‘é‡
            vect v1, v2;
            v1 = vform(p1,p2);
            v2 = vform(p2,p[j]);
            if(cmpv(v1,v2))
            {
                bs.push(p2);
                bs.push(p[j]);
                ++j;
            }
        }
    }
    //åå‘æ‰«æï¼ˆä¸‹å‡¸åŒ…ï¼‰
    int k = n-2;
    while(k >= 0)
    {
        //å–å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶å’Œæ¬¡æ ˆé¡¶
        node p1, p2;
        p2 = bs.top();
        bs.pop();
        p1 = bs.top();
        //æ„é€ å‰ä¹˜å‘é‡
        vect v1, v2;
        v1 = vform(p1,p2);
        v2 = vform(p2,p[k]);
        if(cmpv(v1,v2))
        {
            bs.push(p2);
            bs.push(p[k]);
            --k;
        }
    }
    bs.pop();   //p0é‡å¤è¿›æ ˆä¸€æ¬¡
 
    /*
    while(!bs.empty())
    {
        node tmpp = bs.top();
        printf("(%f,%f)\n", tmpp.x, tmpp.y);
        bs.pop();
    }
    */
    /*
    //è®¡ç®—å‘¨é•¿
    double ans = 0;
    node fp, ep;
    fp = p[0];
    while(!bs.empty())
    {
        ep = bs.top();
        bs.pop();
        ans += vlen(vform(fp, ep));
        fp = ep;
    }
    printf("%.2f\n", ans);
    */
    
    //è®¡ç®—é¢ç§¯
    double ans = 0;
    node fp, np, ep;
    fp = bs.top();
    bs.pop();
    np = bs.top();
    bs.pop();
    while(!bs.empty())
    {
        ep = bs.top();
        bs.pop();
        ans += area(fp,np,ep);
        np = ep;
    }
    printf("%d\n", (int)ans/50);
 
    return 0;
}
